description:
Wataru and Saeru were investiaging on what the principal and vice principal of Takamitsuka High School had up their sleeves. However, Wataru was cross examined by the vice principal about a embrace he had with a girl in front of a hotel. An emergency staff meeting was held to decide on his expulsion. What will be the fate of Wataru and Takamitsuka High School?
Source: crunchyroll
